verbose_text: Ammonium production via mineralization, additions of ammonical fertilizers, animal wastes, and the atmospheric deposition of ammonium increases substrate supply, while competing consumptive processes include microbial assimilation (immobilization), plant assimilation, and ammonia volatilization reduce ammonia concentration.
evidence: Ammonium production via mineralization, additions of ammonical fertilizers, animal wastes, and the atmospheric deposition of ammonium increases substrate supply, while competing consumptive processes include microbial assimilation (immobilization), plant assimilation, and ammonia volatilization reduce ammonia
